R

rd - Variable in class GenerateMap
 
readQValues(String) - Method in class ReinforcementLearning
Reads qvalues from a given file Uses the Buffered Reader class to read the file Reads each line in the file and splits it into two parts: state ID and action q-values If there are actions in a state, they will be assigned to the state THen it searches for the state using its ID, and assigns the q-values to the state using inputQValues method
reinforcementLearning - Variable in class GraphPlotter
 
ReinforcementLearning - Class in <Unnamed>
 
ReinforcementLearning(int) - Constructor for class ReinforcementLearning
Sets all reinforcement learning constants and assigns tiles Every constant used in the code is set here q-values are reset Assign tiles is called, which makes a new maze and adds all tiles in the maze to a list
reinforcementLearningRunner - Variable in class MainMenu
 
ReinforcementTile - Class in <Unnamed>
 
ReinforcementTile(int, int, int) - Constructor for class ReinforcementTile
Gets maze from file, sets variables passed in the constructor and sets q-learning constants Creates a loadmap class to get the maze from the file Sets the q-learning constants Calls assign actions as this must be done before the main loop
repeatTileReward - Variable in class ReinforcementLearning
 
resetQValues() - Method in class ReinforcementLearning
Resets all q values in q values text file to nothing Writes to file using file writer an empty string Catch statement necessary for writing to a file Also resets q values in each states, action list to a default value of 100
resetQValues() - Method in class ReinforcementTile
Resets all q-values to 100 Iterates through all q-values and sets them all to 0
resetScene() - Method in class ReinforcementLearning
After an episode has been completed, all variables are reset The number of steps taken becomes last steps, and steps is reset Episodes incremented Reward is calculated and set to previous reward Reward is reset Epsilon is updated If too many episodes have passed, all q values are reset resets the maze
resetState() - Method in class ReinforcementLearning
